<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Whispering Steps](/Feats.aspx?ID=3677) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Amp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=425" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 27

</column>

---

Your spell leaves a lingering connection between you and a creature—one through which you can nudge the creature's mind this way or that. The amped cantrip must take 2 or more actions to cast, target one or more creatures, and either require a spell attack roll or have a saving throw. Use this amp in place of the psi cantrip's normal amp entry.

---
**Amp** Choose one enemy who is a target of the spell. If that enemy fails its save or the spell hits it, you whisper in the creature's mind, forcing it to Step in a direction of your choosing; as this is [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451), you can't force the creature to Step into hazardous terrain, off a ledge, or the like. After it Steps, the creature becomes temporarily immune to this amp for 24 hours.
name: Whispering Steps
